abstract: Toyota’s failure to make timely disclosure of vehicle problems resulted in the largest fine of an automaker by the United States.
snippet: Toyota’s failure to make timely disclosure of vehicle problems resulted in the largest fine of an automaker by the United States.
lead_paragraph: The Transportation Department said Tuesday that Toyota Motor had paid a $16.4 million civil fine, the largest allowed, over a recall of sticking accelerator pedals on 2.3 million vehicles.

headline.main: Toyota Pays Its $16.4 Million Fine Over Pedals
headline.print_headline: Toyota Pays $16.4 Million, Its Civil Fine Over Recalls
